news_header: Trump threatens to suspend aid to Egypt and Jordan over Palestinian acceptance.
news_original_title: Egypti toisti puolustavansa palestiinalaisten oikeutta jäädä Gazan kaistalle
news_text: President Trump threatened to suspend aid to Egypt and Jordan if they refuse to accept Palestinians. Egypt reiterated its refusal to compromise on Palestinian rights in Gaza after discussions with US Foreign Minister Marco Rubio. The Egyptian Foreign Ministry emphasized its firm stance against any violations of Palestinian rights, including self-determination and independence.
